name: POP POP
summary: A bubble popping game to test your reflexes. Written using Godot game engine. The game features highscore tracking and power ups during the game.

details.title: About
details.content: This game is centred about popping as many bubbles as possible. You start with three lives and can lose a life for every standard bubble not popped or for every red bubble popped. You can gain additional lives by popping green bubbles. The game tracks your highscore. The idea for the game came from my older cousin, who also assisted in the development process.

details.title: Technology
details.content: The game is written using the Godot game engine with GDScript.

name: Geo Go
summary: A flag guessing game. Written using flutter. The game features continent modes as well as some insightful stat tracking

details.title: About
details.content: The game is centred around being shown a flag and guessing the country. You have a maximum of three lives, and lose a life for every incorrectly answered question or if you run out of time. If you are struggling you have access to a hint which at the moment is just the capital city. There is also some pretty useful stat tracking involved which is broken down per continent.

details.title: Technology
details.content: The application is written using flutter. The main source of information for the application comes from https://restcountries.com/.
